items.raw_string: Councillor, Stoke on Trent City Council, Civic Centre, Glebe Street, Stoke-on-Trent ST4 1HH. Until May 2019, I will receive an allowance of £12,000 per annum. Hours: 5-10 hrs per week. This allowance will be donated to local charities. (Registered 05 July 2017)
